directions: Heat broiler to low. Spoon 1 teaspoon cheese into each date; wrap with a basil leaf, then a prosciutto strip. Secure with a toothpick. Broil until cheese bubbles, about 3 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: 4 wide, thin slices prosciutto di Parma, each cut into 4 long strips
title: Dates with Goat Cheese Wrapped in Prosciutto
